description_0: A red Harley Davidson motorcycle is parked next to a bush that is surrounding the base of a tree on a gray cement surface. The motorcycle is facing the left side of the image, the front of the motorcycle is turned slightly toward the bottom left corner of the image. The rims, the frames attaching the wheels, and the handles are silver. The seat area is black leather. A black helmet is hanging from the end of the right handle of the motorcycle. The bush is directly behind the motorcycle and the tree above extends overhead. The tree is casting a shadow over the motorcycle and over most of the bottom half of the image. The front of a red and a gray parked car is visible in the top right corner of the image. There are four pillars visible at the very top of the image further along the cement surface that the motorcycle is parked on.
description_1: A side view of a black bicycle resting against a gray metal post on a red brick sidewalk. the bike is behind the metal post, the frame of the bike is locked to the post with a black bike lock wrapped around it and the post. The bicycle has no seat, it is all black with white rims. The front of the bike is turned toward the bottom left corner of the image. The corner of a square metal manhole cover is visible in the bottom left corner of the image, the front wheel of the bike is placed over it. In the background behind the bike is the bottom of the side of a cream colored building. In the top left corner of the image in the background is a black rectangular planter next to the side of a white building, the planter has two small trees growing out of it.
